featured.text: But what they do not realize is that overtreatment—too many scans, too many blood tests, too many procedures—may pose harm.
After years of hard work, Kareem has not only realized his dream but also transformed a piece of 39 property into a beautiful forest.
Over time, researchers have come to realize the importance of exercising when injured.

other.text: What did Camake realize after the incident of Typhoon Morakot? (A)
When the slave owners realized the power of Capoeira, they began to punish those who practiced it.
Soon, she realizes that her poor family is rich in things that matter in life.
He realizes that only by cooperating can he do his 38 in making society what it should be.
As soon as the couple realized that they didn’t love each other anymore, they _____.
We work very hard to realize this dream.
It took me a long while to realize that there was something more for me to learn about beauty.
(I) did John realize how easy it was.
He saw a man with a hole in the leg of his trousers and 29 realized what Californians 30 for the rough work they were doing—good, strong trousers! 21.

definition.en_def: To become aware of something or to make something happen.
definition.example: She finally realized that she needed to change her habits.
